name: Jack's Grove Destroyer
description:
Fight your way through the endless grove and see how far you can get! 

Made in 3 hours by me for Bean Jam #2

-=Instructions=-

Kill all the enemies in each level and go through the portal in the middle

-=Controls=-

WASD  -  move

Mouse/Left click  -  Aim/Shoot

Note: There is no sound because I ran out of time!!
